concept.title: eBusiness User/Profile Preferences
concept.abstract: Set an organization's Account, Contact, and Accounting Preferences. Hierarchical custom preferences allow Admins to divide an organization into separate functional areas by assigning a different set of preferences to users and profiles.

li.b: Any value selected while creating a record

li.p: The system hierarchy first defers to whatever value is input during record creation, then the User Settings, Profile Settings, and lastly, the Organization Settings.

ul.li: Enable Individual Accounts- Enables the system to automatically create an Account by populating the new account's name with the First and Last Name of the Contact and appending the Individual Account Name Extension.

Individual Account Name Extension- The default value for this field is Person. The value specified in this field appends to the end of the account's name and is conditionally required when selecting the Enable Individual Accounts checkbox.
Update Contact Standard Phone Field- Updates the contact's standard phone number when the preferred phone type field defines a populated phone field.
Update Contact Standard Email Field- Updates the contact's standard email address when the preferred email type field defines a populated email field.

section.b: Creating New User or Profile Preferences

p.b: Setting New User or Profile Preferences will override the Organization Default Account, Contact, and Accounting Preferences for that User or Profile.

ol.li: Click the Create New User/Profile Preference button to return the New Settings modal.
Select an Owner Type from the picklist.

Select the Profile to assign to the Owner Type.
If Owner Type is set to User, assign a user through lookup.

p.lines: Update Contact Standard Phone Field-Copies the preferred phone number for the contact and pastes it into the Phone field.
Update Contact Standard Email Field-Copies the preferred email for the contact and pastes it into the Email field.
Enable Individual Accounts-When a new contact is created, an account with the contact name is also created and appended to the Individual Account Name Extension.

sectiondiv.p: Enter the Business Group and Payment Terms.
Next, enter the Income Account, A/R Account, Adjustment Account, Discount Account, and Refund Account.
Click Submit to finish customizing a User or Profile's accounting preferences.
